frame_ct_threshold.description: Number of frames before AFD algorithm starts

frame_smooth_detection_thr.description: After certain frames, detection rate is slower

frame_smooth_ct_threshold.description: After certain frames, detection rate is slower. Recommended value: double frame_smooth_detection_thr

num_frames.description: How many frames to gather before performing analysis

frame_skip.description: Detecting flicker by comparing frame N to frame N + skip

num_rows.description: Number of rows in rowsum stats

num_cols.description: Number of column regions in rowsum stats

switch_on_first_detection.description: AFD detection 2 times to reduce false positive for extreme cases. ex. PIP or low band number

max_attempts_for_second_detection.description: How many frames to be said it is detected twice.

AFD_continuous_enable.description: Will keep AFD algorithm running during camera session

num_frames_settle.description: max frame count for new AFD setting to take effect

max_exp_time_ms.description: Max exp time we still do AFD, in ms,

AFD_always_on_enable.description: no matter how less the exp_time, AFD will detect flicker

AFD_static_band_enable.description: Flag to enable static band processing

af_status_check.description: params to check AF active or not

af_status_select.description: select af status as len position based or af_active flag based

frame_similarity_check_enable.description: Flag to enable similarity check between consecutive frames

lux_index_start.description: Lux index based trigger point: start

lux_index_end.description: Lux index based trigger point: end

lux_index_start.description: Lux index based trigger point: start

lux_index_end.description: Lux index based trigger point: end

percent_threshold.description: Percentage of peaks rolling in same direction threshold, when FOV is small and there is only one peak per frame

diff_threshold.description: Differential threshold to detect a peak

num_peaks_threshold.description: Number of peaks to detect to declare flicker

num_flicker_threshold.description: the threshold for total number of flicker detected in column

band_dist_comp.description: Peak distance must be at least computed distance * band_dist_comp to be considered

band_range_min.description: To decide flicker or not: peak width range min

band_range_max.description: To decide flicker or not: peak width range max

thldLevel2Ratio.description: Energy ratio threshold for level 2, Q8 format

thldLevel3Ratio.description: Energy ratio threshold for level 3, Q8 format

thldLevel2Col.description: How many columns need to detect flicker in level 2

thldLevel3Col.description: How many columns need to detect flicker in level 3

thldEkL.description: lower energy threshold of k_th level processing, Q10 format

thldEkU.description: lower energy threshold of k_th level processing, Q10 format

thldCounterL3.description: Positive frame counter threshold for level 3 detection

thldCounterL2.description: Positive frame counter threshold for level 2 detection

LevelDepth.description: Decides whether process only level 3 or both level 2 and 3

static_slope_steep_thr.description: When linear regression slope is steeper we will not consider that data. Default value Q16

static_slope_not_steep_thr.description: When linear regression slope is lower we will boost energy ratio. Default value Q16

static_confidence_level_slope_ratio.description: when linear regression is not steep: boost energy ratio that indicates static bands

static_confidence_thr_h.description: High threshold for signal to determine confidence

static_confidence_thr_l.description: Low threshold for signal to determine confidence

static_confidence_ratio_h.description: How much ratio will be applied for high threshold

static_confidence_ratio_l.description: How much ratio will be applied for low threshold

static_low_rowsum_thr.description: When rowsum values are lower than this threshold, increase rowsum data itself

static_low_rowsum_comp.description: When rowsum values are lower than static_low_rowsum_thr apply this compensation gain

num_bands_dependent_downsampling.description: downSampling Factor according to number of bands

thldCounterL3.description: Positive frame counter threshold for level 3 detection

LevelDepth.description: Decides whether process only level 3 or both level 2 and 3
